title: Privacy Scare! Google's Go Programming Language Wants to Enable Telemetry by Default
description: A proposed change to Google's Go programming language toolchain might end up scaring off developers more than ever.

title: Design is a New 2D CAD App for Linux in Development
description: A minimal-looking software tool with essential features, Design aims to be a nice 2D CAD option for Linux users.

title: Fedora's New Anaconda Web UI Installer is Looking Good
description: The progress on the new Anaconda web installer looks good. Take a sneak peek.
